details.title: Wideband-scaled Radon-Fourier transform for high-speed radar target detection

authors.affiliation: Air Force Early Warning Academy, School of Information and Electronic, Beijing Institute of Technology
authors.name: Li-Chang Qian

authors.affiliation: School of Information and Electronic, Beijing Institute of Technology
authors.name: Jia Xu

authors.affiliation: Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, University of Delaware
authors.name: Xiang-Gen Xia

authors.affiliation: School of Information and Electronic, Beijing Institute of Technology
authors.name: Teng Long

authors.affiliation: Department of Electronic Engineering, Tsinghua University
authors.name: Ying-Ning Peng

details.abstract: High target speed, long pulse duration or wide signal bandwidth may cause noticeable scale effect on radar echoes, for which the conventional narrowband matched filter may introduce an obvious signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) loss for target detection. To obtain the ideal SNR gain in the above scenarios, a novel long-time coherent integration method has been proposed, namely wideband-scaled Radon-Fourier transform (WSRFT). The proposed WSRFT can compensate the scale effect not only on the single pulse but also among the multiple pulses in a long coherent integration time. Furthermore, the performance comparison between the proposed WSRFT and the existing Radon-Fourier transform method is given. Finally, some numerical experimental results are also provided to demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed WSRFT method.

ieee.title: Fast Non-Searching Method for Maneuvering Target Detection and Motion Parameters Estimation
ieee.displayText: Xiaolong Li, Guolong Cui, Lingjiang Kong, Wei Yi, "Fast Non-Searching Method for Maneuvering Target Detection and Motion Parameters Estimation", Signal Processing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 64, pp. 2232-2244, 2016, ISSN 1053-587X.

ieee.title: Weak target detection based on complex Duffing oscillator for HFSWR
ieee.displayText: Ling Zhang, Li-Ping Zeng, Ming Li, Hong-Du Wang, "Weak target detection based on complex Duffing oscillator for HFSWR", Control Conference (CCC) 2016 35th Chinese, pp. 4982-4987, 2016, ISSN 1934-1768.

ieee.title: Joint estimation of motion parameters using Newton's method
ieee.displayText: Zhenmiao Deng, Maozhong Fu, Sheng Jin, Yixiong Zhang, Zhiling Wang, "Joint estimation of motion parameters using Newton's method", Aerospace and Electronic Systems IEEE Transactions on, vol. 51, pp. 3386-3398, 2015, ISSN 0018-9251.

ieee.title: Coherent Integration Algorithm for a Maneuvering Target With High-Order Range Migration
ieee.displayText: Lingjiang Kong, Xiaolong Li, Guolong Cui, Wei Yi, Yichuan Yang, "Coherent Integration Algorithm for a Maneuvering Target With High-Order Range Migration", Signal Processing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 63, pp. 4474-4486, 2015, ISSN 1053-587X.
